# `OpenDataIngestionRuleRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | `string` | Yes | The name of the data ingestion rule. |
| description | `string` | No | A description of the data ingestion rule. |
| externalSource | [`DomainEntityRef`](domainentityref-definition.md) | Yes | The external source associated with this open data ingestion rule, which will be used when performing identity resolution |
